#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
       int T;
       unsigned long long int a,b;
       
       scanf("%d",&T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
          scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
          if(a == b)
           {
           if(a%2 == 0)
             printf("%lld\n",a+b);
           else
             printf("%lld\n",(a+b)-1);
           }
          else if((a-b)==2)
           {
             if(a%2==0)
              printf("%lld\n",a+b);
             else
              printf("%lld\n",(a+b)-1);
           }
          else
             printf("No Number\n");
       }
            
            return 0;
            }
